description: Gets information about the search domains owned by this account. Can be limited to specific domains. Shows all domains by default. To get the number of searchable documents in a domain, use the console or submit a matchall request to your domain's search endpoint: q=matchall&q.parser=structured&size=0. For more information, see Getting Information about a Search Domain in the Amazon CloudSearch Developer Guide.

parameters.name: DomainNames
parameters.description: The names of the domains you want to include in the response. (string) --- A string that represents the name of a domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

nested_items.name: DomainStatusList
nested_items.description: A list that contains the status of each requested domain.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: An internally generated unique identifier for a domain.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: A string that represents the name of a domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the search domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: True if the search domain is created. It can take several minutes to initialize a domain when  CreateDomain is called. Newly created search domains are returned from  DescribeDomains with a false value for Created until domain creation is complete.

nested_items.name: Deleted
nested_items.description: True if the search domain has been deleted. The system must clean up resources dedicated to the search domain when  DeleteDomain is called. Newly deleted search domains are returned from  DescribeDomains with a true value for IsDeleted for several minutes until resource cleanup is complete.

nested_items.name: DocService
nested_items.description: The service endpoint for updating documents in a search domain.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint to which service requests can be submitted. For example, search-imdb-movies-oopcnjfn6ugofer3zx5iadxxca.eu-west-1.cloudsearch.amazonaws.com or doc-imdb-movies-oopcnjfn6ugofer3zx5iadxxca.eu-west-1.cloudsearch.amazonaws.com.

nested_items.name: SearchService
nested_items.description: The service endpoint for requesting search results from a search domain.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint to which service requests can be submitted. For example, search-imdb-movies-oopcnjfn6ugofer3zx5iadxxca.eu-west-1.cloudsearch.amazonaws.com or doc-imdb-movies-oopcnjfn6ugofer3zx5iadxxca.eu-west-1.cloudsearch.amazonaws.com.

nested_items.name: RequiresIndexDocuments
nested_items.description: True if  IndexDocuments needs to be called to activate the current domain configuration.

nested_items.name: Processing
nested_items.description: True if processing is being done to activate the current domain configuration.

nested_items.name: SearchInstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type that is being used to process search requests.

nested_items.name: SearchPartitionCount
nested_items.description: The number of partitions across which the search index is spread.

nested_items.name: SearchInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of search instances that are available to process search requests.
